comment: The only qualm I have with this professor is that he took points off of my attendance grade because he had apparently marked me absent despite my presence in his class everyday. Speak louder than me during roll call, and you'll be golden.
Fun guy who is clearly super passionate about the subject. Very available outside class.

Had high hopes for his class but got a very bad impression of him right off the bat, which is sad considering he's heavily involved in my major. He deemed disinterested in his intro class and just kind of went over the layout of the campus.
He has a unique teaching style. You definitely want to pay attention in class. And don't be afraid to ask questions. He loves that, and you'll be helping your classmates and yourself.

He is a really good professor.  He is a tough grader and is always there to help if needed.   Really cool class overall!!  I have never put more work into a 1000 level class than this one.   If you are wanting to see if engineering is right for you, take this class.

The class is literally the hardest class with  double  time and effort compared to others since its the required course for MTRE students to graduate. His grading on HWs, labs, and tests is super strict. I regret taking it coz my  other class got distracted  and I am EE major. Tests don't come from previous exams, HWs, slides, or quizzes. Good luck

Although I just took his Hitch-hikers class, he was a great professor that made a typically boring subject interesting. He cared very much about all the students and tried to help in any way he could. He is an incredibly nice guy who has done a lot in his life. Definitely great person to talk to.
Very cool professor and really cares about his students. He is super tough about grades, as he will tell you multiple times. He cares about his students and is willing to meet halfway.

Great Teacher,  you will learn a lot from his class, very helpful and willing to go the extra mile to make sure students understand,you have to work hard for your grade!! he likes to challenge the students to do better, after all Engineering is not easy, Great teacher

Dr.McFall is a very laid back professor. He can be a little some of the material he teaches can be difficult and he will force you to think through the material but he is a very fair teacher. He is always willing to listen and help his students in any way he can. I would definitely recommend taking him for any and every class he teaches.
